about_the_game:
• The Madness of Billiards offers a unique pool experience that combines the classic strategy of the game with an exciting fantasy adventure. In this game, it's not just about sinking balls into the pockets; it's about defending your heart and challenging the minions threatening to destroy it. As you progress through the levels, you unlock cards that grant special powers and face increasingly challenging enemies. Your goal is to protect your heart and destroy your opponent's, while skillfully handling the cue stick and planning your next move. The difficulty increases with each round, challenging your skill and strategy in the classic game of pool taken to a new level. Get ready for the madness; welcome to 'THE MADNESS OF BILLIARDS'!

  • In 'The Madness of Billiards', fun and strategy come together in a unique experience that challenges your skills in pool and your ingenuity in tactics. With 57 evolving cues, each with a unique set of abilities, and 54 different avatars to customize your style, you have endless possibilities to create the perfect combination that suits your gameplay strategy. Additionally, with 68 different monsters in the game, facing new challenges will never be monotonous. Each world in 'THE MADNESS OF BILLIARDS' offers a unique setting that adds an extra layer of excitement and challenge to your gaming experience. From the lush landscapes of Nature to the fiery battlegrounds of Fire, each world hosts its own set of unique monsters, each with special abilities that will challenge your skill and strategy. Dive into the jungle of Nature, challenge your opponents in the Arena, navigate the currents of Water, soar high in the Sky, explore the depths of Space, traverse the icy landscapes of Ice, face the flames of Fire, and delve into the mystery of Halloween. Get ready to immerse yourself in madness and enjoy a pool experience like no other!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 High Sierra or higher
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 600 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with macOS
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur or higher
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i7 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 555X or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with macOS

short_description: Pocket balls while facing monsters on the table. With more worlds than you can imagine, the heart of it all is Halloween, where ghosts, goblins, witches, and more lurk in every level. Protect your heart and conquer the madness in this ultimate pool adventure!

English*, Spanish - Spain
